channel.title: Client always freezing
channel.description: So when i try to join a server (usually takes a while) the client(v3.2) would tend to freeze and stop responding on simple tasks. with version 4 of the client, when i try to enter any server using version 4, it always freezes at the log in screen, how do i fix this?

item.title: Client always freezing
item.dc:creator: @ramageturke ramageturke
item.description:
@ramageturke wrote:

So when i try to join a server (usually takes a while) the client(v3.2) would tend to freeze and stop responding on simple tasks. with version 4 of the client, when i try to enter any server using version 4, it always freezes at the log in screen, how do i fix this?
